title: Champ select lockout
body:
Have an issue where when i change summoner spells in champ select, my screen gives the overlay to darken the rest of champ select, and then leaves it stuck like that for the rest of champion select, not letting me pick a champion, change masteries, even close the program from the window. 

This has happened a few times now and is causing me to rack up soft bans for "dodging" when i have no chance to select anything.
I'd like to know If this is a common bug, or if i just have crap luck.
I'd also like to know if there is a fix, as this is really a pretty big inconvenience

replies.body:
We've actually just deployed a fix for this issue - if you're still having this problem, close your client and relogin.  The patcher should then grab the fix and install it. 

If you're still having the problem after that - please let us know!

Hey there,

The issue you're experiencing has been acknowledged by Riot and they're working on a fix, see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/hprhLF4v-61-champion-select-bug-unable-to-select-champion-after-changing-summoner-spells) thread for more information and for how YOU can help speed up the fix.

In regards to your leaverbuster punishments, these cannot be reversed as leaverbuster is an automated system, see the [leaverbuster FAQ](https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=2&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwiyseet1qrKAhVMB44KHam6AbAQFggpMAE&url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.riotgames.com%2Fhc%2Fen-us%2Farticles%2F201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ&usg=AFQjCNGmU5KcQHJUOLzO5BnJt38X4uZIEA&sig2=Ji01hX0YMx9j2Z8fcEh-Vg) for more information regarding the leaverbuster system.
